title: Evolving from Service Manager
content:
When evolving an existing Service Manager system, it's highly recommended to follow the overall guidelines and steps from the Implementation Checklist in the Key concepts guide. In addition to the information contained in the checklist, this section highlights additional steps and information that's directly related to a Service Manager implementation. Although these documents are specific to Service Manager, they may also be useful when evolving from other systems as well. This information includes:

  • Differences from Service Manager
  • Collecting Environment Information
  • Core Data and the SMA Evolution Toolkit
  • SMAX/SM Dual Mode
